caption: Itâ€™s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. The men are sad to find one of them is seriously hurt and finally dies. But they have no time to mourn. One of them reminds other people, and their leader runs out to catch the man who is escaped. He runs after the instruction of his fellows. He runs into a hall and runs on the roof of buildings. He jumps between buildings and runs into a restaurant on the roof. He runs through an office, and finally find the escaped man. That man tries to kill him, but then he gives up and has a conversation with him.
